channel.title: Vuara on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Vuara on Rusland 1

item.title: Vuara – Less & Without (Меньше Слов & Без Людей)
item.description: Vuara is still young. Music videos are for later, and their repertoire is still limited. Just one album, but it weighs heavy enough for two: Свобода шума (Freedom of Noise, 2020). Here are two songs: one about less (words) and one about without (people).
